text: Neveruyushchiye, uporstvuya, sprashivayut: "Pochemu Mukhammad ne prishol k nam s yasnym znameniyem ot svoyego Gospoda, kotoroye zastavilo by nas verit' v nego?!" Neuzheli oni oprovergayut Koran, v kotorom privodyatsya svedeniya o predshestvuyushchikh narodakh, soderzhashchiyesya v predydushchikh Otkroveniyakh, i ob ikh gibeli za to, chto oni otvergali poslannikov? Koran - Istina! Mukhammad ne vydumyval yego
